website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable twin size airbed that does not sacrifice comfort or ease of use. Ideal for sleepovers, camping trips, and emergency guests.
pros: Generous weight capacity for adult sleepers
Extra wide valve openings make it easy to inflate and deflate
Flocked top holds bedding in place
Entry-level price point ideal for multiple purchases
cons: Noticeable air leakage reported after inflation

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these mattress are so comfortable, my niece weigh about 300 hundred pounds and she had no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: ellen williamsseck

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable and did not lose air during the night
customer_reviews.text: This mattress worked perfectly for us. It was comfortable and did not lose air during the night. I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Adele Cluck

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress works great for the cost. I would recommend it to others. It is a twin size so do not expect to share it with people, but this was purchased for using inside my SUV while car camping and it fits that need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Pyko

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after return policy
customer_reviews.text: Got it and worked good for awhile. Right when the return policy was o er the mattress stopped holding air. Sent a question asking for advice for finding the leak or any suggestions and got a response that showed they lacked customer service and care for the customer. Wasn’t asking for a refund but the response was basically your outside refund policy so there is nothing they could do. They could even offer advice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also works as a bed for large dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using this as a bed for a large dog. I have a heavy blanket on top of it to keep his nails from puncturing the mattress. Works great and my 120lb dog loves it. Needs to come with an inflation device. I used my neighbors air compressor. Great Buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for temp use for few days
customer_reviews.text: Air keeps very well for 5 days without inflation. It is good air bed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value. I bought two this summer
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Great value. I bought two this summer. They've both Survived a week at camp with teenaged girls, and several uses for sleepovers at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's been great, exactly what we need
customer_reviews.text: 4 uses so far, it's been great, exactly what we need, great price
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Wasting of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it.It is the same mattress that they sell at Walmart and they sell it for seven dollars. It doesn’t even worth its money for its quality . It is not even good . Wasting of money
customer_reviews.author: vn

customer_reviews.title: came with air pump
customer_reviews.text: overall good for camping or overnight visitor, lost air after 2nd night, but once filled again held it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, can't beat price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, can't beat price. I didn't fully read up on it and didn't realize it didn't come with a pump. I bought one from Amazon at fair price and it all works great.
customer_reviews.author: stevencneedham

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work at all! I’m so disappointed with this order
customer_reviews.author: Riri

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable was gonna use to go to river but will not use it at cabin due to covid19 but will surely use at home
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! It works exactly like it said it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Suong

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with a pump. Used my hairdryer on the cool setting & it inflated fast. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting just get a motor
customer_reviews.text: Its durable and a great value had to get this after my bigger inflatable mattress ripped worth every penny just make sure to get a separate motor
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for toddlers to tweens but maybe not too big ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for ten year old boys. I also bought an electric pump to inflate them quicker. They are perfect for toddlers to tweens but maybe not too big of a kid because are not real thick. They are easy to deflate and a great add for extra guests.
customer_reviews.author: GoToGirl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stable. I am not sure whether you can ...
customer_reviews.text: have been using this for about 4 months only with the initial air pumping. Pretty stable. I am not sure whether you can have a sex on it (as I haven't so far sadly), but i think it can resist very intense humping too.
customer_reviews.author: jinsol kim

customer_reviews.title: Looses all it's air every 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to take grand kids camping. It is a ripoff! They tell you it expands and looses air for a while. Mine goes completely flat in 2 hours. I fill it up over and over and still 2 hours later it is flat. I decided to return it and they want me to pay for shipping. Please pay attention to my and other reviews and don't buy these leaking mattresses. Too bad I didn't. BTW, if it didn't leak it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for some kids we were hosting. They survived a group of 7 middle school boys sitting, jumping, stepping on, and so much more abuse. Both are in perfect shape afterwards. I did have to add air to both, but there's no slow leak or hole. Believe me I check well afterwards. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: 2remem

customer_reviews.title: Second One Down After 6 Usages, First Lasted 12... It's Great Till It's Not
customer_reviews.text: Sorry gang, but this is a piece of crap. Its comfy but falls apart, leaks air almost immediately. I bought one in Nov 2017, it lasted till Aug 2018; bought a replacement and its leaking air in a big way after about 6 uses, 7 months. Well... you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic lining will not last more than one use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for camping. First time use was great second time would not stay inflated. It’s only five months between camping. I guess the vinyl crack somewhere and would not stay inflated. Very disappointing since it was super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: SimonPAK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant, but was worth the money and pretty comfortable and easy to inflate only took seconds.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is ideal for camping. It is light and remains so when inflated. It is a easy process to setup and transport. The fact that it is inexpensive, makes it a winner.
customer_reviews.author: claud009

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last a week... it would deflate minutes after inflation
customer_reviews.author: Valrie Charles

customer_reviews.title: Ruptured internally
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and I've been using it as my main bed for a couple of months. It has ruptured internally and 2 of the chambers have joined together. This has made it impossible to sleep on. However, products like this are not intended for regular use so perhaps I am asking too much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Finch

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great, but would’ve been nice if it came with its own pump.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Great. Night two Used for kids spending the night. Aired up fast and stayed up all night! :)
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: ... on a 16 day camping trip and it lasted great! It does take a few times of filling ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a 16 day camping trip and it lasted great! It does take a few times of filling it to stretch out all the way of course, so maybe fill it once or twice before your trip. It was very comfy and now I still use it for when friends stay over.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonRae

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Folded up easily and back into a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Inflated fast. Very comfortable. Folded up easily and back into a small square.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated but the ridges are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These hold up to where you don’t have to inflate them constantly, but the ridges are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Homestead maker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It's going to be great for camping!
customer_reviews.author: mary ruggeri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its good to have on hand for whenever company shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

product_meta.title: Intex Twin 8.75" Classic Downy Inflatable Airbed Mattress (1)
product_meta.description: Intex Twin 8.75" Classic Downy Inflatable Airbed Mattress (1)
feature_bullets: Perfect for both in-home use and camping Plush flocked top Flocked top keeps the sheets in place Easy to clean Compact for storage Extra wide valve openings for fast inflating and deflating Measures: 39"L x 75"W x 8.75"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
